vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in Reentrancy_secure.withdrawBalance (patch_13.sol#7-18):
	External calls:
	- (success) = msg.sender.call.value(amountToWithdraw)() (patch_13.sol#14)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- lock (patch_13.sol#17)
